content.question: The ideas in the excerpt about women’s roles in society have the most in common with ideas associated with which of the following?

choices.label: Activism on behalf of women’s rights during the middle of the nineteenth century
The greater separation of home and workplace during the first decades of the nineteenth century
Political and social reform efforts led by women’s clubs during the late nineteenth century
The increased participation of women in the workforce during the Second World War

content.answer: The greater separation of home and workplace during the first decades of the nineteenth century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
